about_the_game:
💥 Dive Deep into a Labyrinthine World: Immerse yourself in an enigmatic maze where every twist and turn promises adrenaline-pumping encounters. Armed with guts, determination, and a cannon that fires beachball grenades, you’ll outwit ruthless robot chickens in a game where the stakes are always high!

👩 Feisty Female Protagonist: Navigate the maze as only a fierce heroine can. But be warned, you're up against a deadly sisterhood of relentless robotic fowl!

🛎️ Your Mission, Should You Choose to Accept It: To hunt down the 23 elusive bells scattered through the maze.

🚫 Slay, but Survive: With no final boss battle, the real challenge is to outlive and outsmart.

🔥 Power-Ups & Pick-Ups: Start as an underdog and transform into a maze master! From the M86 Motion Tracker to the Z-Series Quantum Boots, every pick-up makes you a force to be reckoned with. You'll receive tactical support and supplies beamed straight from HQ to aid you in the combat zone.

🍗 Chicken Combat: Think chickens are all cluck and no bite? Think again. With regular and ninja variants, these beady-eyed birds promise mayhem. Score multiplier bonuses with skillful eliminations and leverage the ninjas’ forcefields for tactical advantage!

🎲 Boundless Exploration: Jump with gazelle-like grace atop hedges, find the lost keycards, and save the world. Randomized enemies and power-ups means endless replayability!

🌀 Vortex Jump Disc: Your ticket to tactical advantage and escapes. This versatile space-twisting tool offers a range of tactical mechanics from instant emergency teleportation to high-flying aerial views. Use it wisely!

🚀 A Multilayered Experience: Whether you crave the heart-pounding rush of "Hot Wings" or a lighter challenge in "Mild", there's a mode that mirrors your mood and mastery.

🎉 The Ultimate Gaming Adventure Awaits: Get ready for a rollercoaster of emotions, strategy, and pure fun! Each step in the maze brings a new challenge, a fresh thrill, and a test of your wits.

So grab your gear, embrace the unexpected, and remember: in "Chasing Chickens", it's not just about surviving, it's about living the adventure. As the maze unravels, so will the depth of your prowess. Ready to take the plunge? Dive in, and let the chase begin!

short_description: CHASING CHICKENS is where Quake's adrenaline meets Pac-Man's wit. Dive into 3D chaos with old-school charm: exploding beachballs, an army of killer chickens, floating cows, all in a hedge maze. Armed with a high-powered grenade launcher, it's a wild race. Outsmart, outrun, outplay. Ready, soldier?
